scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:crypto-info" "npm run start:holdings" "npm run start:placed-trade" "npm run start:base-app"
scripts.install-mfes: concurrently --kill-others "cd ./base-app && npm install" "cd ./crypto-info && npm install" "cd ./holdings && npm install" "cd ./placed-trade && npm install"
